Start the STEM RCP in "Designer" perspective and then start a build in Scenario.  STEM will switch to the "Simulation" perspective, but the Map View will not display the running simulation unless it is selected in the ActiveSimulations view.  When the Simulation is "stopped" the following exception is thrown.

if more than one running simulation was closed simultaneously it was possible for a SimulationManagerEvent to arrive with two simulations to delete, if the first one was the one being displayed then the second would cause the null pointer exception.  The fix was to break out of the test loop when the first had been removed from the MapControl
